basics.name: Stevedan Ogochukwu Omodolor Omodia
basics.label: Robotic Engineer
basics.summary: I am a graduate in Mechanical Engineering with a Master's in Automatic Control and Robotics, deeply passionate about designing and building autonomous systems. My expertise spans the entire development process—from mechanical design and robotic integration to software programming in languages like C++, Python, and frameworks such as ROS. Additionally, I have a strong academic background in algorithms for robot control and computer vision. What drives me the most is not just the skills I've acquired but the joy of applying them to solve complex problems.

work.name: Robotic research group KU Leuven
work.summary: Worked on upgrading the PR2 robots arm to use EtherCat Compliant drivers under Prof. Dr. Ir. Herman Bruyninckx. The integration was done using [SOEM library](https://github.com/OpenEtherCATsociety/SOEM). The end goal was to allow force and torque control of the robot arm using petrinet based state machines to allow real-time control.

work.name: Perception and manipulation lab at IRI - Institut de Robòtica i Informàtica Industrial, CSIC-UPC
work.summary: Conducted research on manipulation for cloth grasping with the Tiago robot under Prof. Júlia Borràs Sol

work.name: Mobile robotic lab at IRI - Institut de Robòtica i Informàtica Industrial, CSIC-UPC
work.summary: Worked on control algorithms for grape picking using the Tiago robot under Prof. Alberto Sanfeliu

work.name: Open Source Projects
work.summary: In my free time, I contribute to open-source projects like Navigation2.

work.name: Unmanned Life
work.summary: Developing autonomous drone solutions for surveillance applications. My responsibilities from a technical point of view include works from software development for drone control, localization and Behavior Tree-based mission planning, mechanical design of drone components and leading the hardware integration that involved integration of Nvidia Jetson for onboard processing on multiple drones. I also interact with clients as project technical lead to understand their requirements and give that information to the team to find the best and appropriate solution.

volunteer.summary: Worked on designing part for the space rover for the European rover challenge
